Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to exceed your expectations. This exceptional item is valued at $1500000 to us, reflecting its unparalleled quality, craftsmanship, and unique features. We believe it could be a valuable addition to your collection or business, potentially enhancing its prestige and functionality. Considering its significance, we are offering you the opportunity to acquire this masterpiece at an exclusive price of $1250000. We understand that the value of such a product may be subjective, but we are confident that this offer presents an attractive proposition. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. We look forward to the possibility of bringing this extraordinary piece into your possession. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $1,250,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $1,250,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $1,000,000
